name: wen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a lump (= raised part) that has grown on the skin: He had a strange wen on his face, below the right side of his mouth. Compare
boil noun (SWELLING)
More examplesFewer examplesWhy don't you have that wen removed? It is a very simple operation.Emerson urged every individual to feel God within to fortify them, and if they don’t feel that within themselves, they become like a wart or a wen.He was a tall, meagre man, with a nose like a wen.A wen is the old word for a sebaceous cyst. Don't touch them!
